mangas.description: In a world where humanity resides within massive walled cities to protect themselves from giant humanoid creatures called Titans, a young boy reviewerNamed Eren Yeager vows to eradicate the Titans after witnessing the destruction of his hometown and the death of his mother.

reviews.rating: Determined and vengeful, willing to go to any lengths to achieve freedom.
Loyal and protective, with unmatched combat skills.
Intelligent and strategic, values peace and understanding.
Ruthless and efficient, known as humanity's strongest soldier.
Charismatic leader, willing to make difficult decisions for the greater good.

mangas.description: Denji, a young man drowning in debt, merges with his pet devil Pochita to become the Chainsaw Man. He is recruited by the Public Safety Devil Hunters to fight against devils threatening humanity.

reviews.rating: Reckless and simple-minded, driven by basic desires but with a strong sense of loyalty.
Chaotic and unpredictable, loves blood and violence but has a soft spot for Denji.
Calm and composed, driven by a sense of justice and a desire for revenge.
Mysterious and manipulative, has a hidden agenda and incredible power.
Loyal and self-sacrificing, embodies the pure form of Denji’s desires.

mangas.description: Yuji Itadori, a high school student with incredible physical abilities, becomes involved in the world of Jujutsu Sorcerers when he swallows a cursed object—a finger of Sukuna, the King of Curses. He must learn to control his newfound powers and fight against malevolent curses.

reviews.rating: Compassionate and strong-willed, determined to save others at any cost.
Stoic and serious, values justice and believes in saving people he deems worthy.
Bold and confident, loves her individuality and fights with a strong sense of self.
Extremely powerful and eccentric, values his students and fights for a better world.
Malevolent and arrogant, sees humans as insignificant and enjoys causing chaos.

mangas.description: Shigeo Kageyama, known as Mob, is an average middle school boy with powerful psychic abilities. He tries to live a normal life while keeping his emotions in check, but as his suppressed feelings reach 100%, his psychic powers go out of control.

reviews.rating: Reserved and kind-hearted, struggles with self-confidence but possesses immense psychic power.
Charismatic and resourceful, a con artist who genuinely cares for Mob.
Ambitious and competitive, admires and resents Mob's abilities.
Arrogant and confident, learns humility after losing to Mob.
Trickster spirit, initially selfish but becomes a helpful ally to Mob.

mangas.description: Guts, a lone mercenary with a tragic past, battles his way through a dark medieval world filled with demons, corrupt nobility, and his inner turmoil. He joins the Band of the Hawk, only to find himself caught in a horrific fate.

reviews.rating: Strong-willed and relentless, driven by revenge and the will to survive.
Loyal and determined, struggles with her feelings for Guts and Griffith.
Charismatic and ambitious, willing to sacrifice anything for his dream.
Mysterious and wise, acts as a guide and protector.
Dedicated Band of the Falcon member with keen perception and self-awareness.

mangas.description: A young Viking warrior reviewerNamed Thorfinn seeks revenge against Askeladd, the man who killed his father. Along the way, he gets entangled in the politics and battles of the Viking age.

reviews.rating: Driven and tenacious, he dedicates his life to avenging his father’s death.
Cunning and ruthless, he commands a band of mercenaries and harbors a complex background.
Brutal and enthusiastic in battle, he is both a formidable foe and an ally to Thorfinn.
Initially timid, he evolves into a strong and decisive leader.
Loyal to Askeladd, he is a fierce warrior who gains strength from consuming berserker mushrooms.

mangas.description: Kosei Arima, a piano prodigy, loses his ability to hear the sound of the piano after his mother's death. His world changes when he meets a spirited violinist reviewerNamed Kaori Miyazono, who helps him rediscover his love for music.

reviews.rating: Talented but troubled, he struggles with the trauma of his past and learns to live and love again.
Free-spirited and passionate, she brings color back into Kosei’s world with her music and lively personality.
Kosei's childhood friend, who has complex feelings of friendship and love for him.

mangas.description: Hinata Shoyo, inspired by a volleyball ace known as 'The Little Giant,' joins his high school volleyball team to pursue his dream of playing in nationals. Despite his short stature, he learns to excel with the help of his rival and teammate, Kageyama.

reviews.rating: Energetic and determined, he overcomes obstacles with his unbreakable spirit and agility.
A perfectionist setter with immense talent, he learns to trust his teammates and work as part of a team.
The captain and backbone of Karasuno, he leads with strength and compassion.
Cynical and analytical, he gradually finds his own passion for the game.

mangas.description: After bullying a deaf girl reviewerNamed Shoko Nishimiya in elementary school, Shoya Ishida is ostracized by his peers. Years later, he sets out to make amends and find redemption.

reviews.rating: Remorseful and introspective, he struggles to overcome his guilt and find forgiveness.
Kind and forgiving, she faces challenges with resilience and strives to connect with others despite her disability.
Protective of her sister, she is initially wary of Shoya but eventually comes to accept his friendship.
Shoya’s new friend, loyal and supportive, he helps Shoya navigate his path to redemption.

mangas.description: Light Yagami, a high school student, discovers a mysterious notebook that grants him the power to kill anyone whose reviewerName he writes in it. As he tries to create a utopia free of crime, he faces off against the genius detective L.

reviews.rating: Brilliant and ambitious, he becomes increasingly ruthless as he pursues his vision of a perfect world.
Mysterious and highly intelligent, a master detective dedicated to uncovering Kira’s identity.
A shinigami who enjoys watching the chaos unfold, he drops the Death Note into the human world out of boredom.
